title: Pillars Of Eternity (Mac) (Patch 1.03 + Hotfix) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for POE mac. Please read what I'm about to write. In my previous mac torrent, there a file named "dlc_pillars_of_eternity_preorder_2.0.0.1.pkg". If you installed that file, you will have to re-install the game. Please read the instruction below

1: Back up your saves. You can find the saves in the location below
System Ã¢â€“Â¸ user Ã¢â€“Â¸ myname Ã¢â€“Â¸ Library Ã¢â€“Â¸ Application Support

2: Delete game. 

3: Re-install Game

4: Install patch 2.1.0.1 and then install patch 2.1.1

5: Finally install the pre-order dlc pkg.

Change notes for patch 1.03 and hotfix.


This is the latest version that includes hotfixes which fixed a problem with adventurer hall-created companions not being able to unlock doors or chests and also fixed an issue where people were unable to open certain doors due to the Fog of War. 


If you missed the 1.03 update, the full changelog can be found here:
  <a href="
https://forums.obsidian.net/blog/7/entry-179-patch-notes-103/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
